text.p: You have advantage on checks to sneak and hide. Your attacks deal double damage against targets that are unaware of your presence.
3/day, teleport to a location you can see within near. This does not use your action.
You earned the right to eat a petal of the fabled black lotus flower, and you survived its sorcerous effects.
Roll one talent on the Black Lotus Talents table. Whenever you roll on this table, you may reroll duplicates or keep them.
